text: Bruce Behruz Fardanesh from the New York Power Authority (NYPA) in White Plains, NY was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to phasor measurement technology and flexible AC transmission systems. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Engineers from New York (state) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Bruce Behruz Fardanesh
